question: Which country is the largest producer of Hydroxychloroquine accounting for nearly 70 per cent of annual global production?
explanation:
India is the largest producer and exporter of Hydroxychloroquine with nearly 70 per cent of annual global production. 
As per the recent announcement from the Department of Pharmaceuticals, our country has enough stock and manufacturing capacity of the formulation to cater both the domestic requirement and export commitments. Indian Council of Medical Research (ICMR) had recommended hydroxychloroquine to be used as a preventive medication for persons in the high-risk group.
